name: Shaddy's Fears (Jules JALLIFFIER-MERLON)
description:
In Shaddy's Fears you play a little and cute associal character named Shaddy. You will help him cross troughout the passers-by but careful the light will also hurt you! Good luck walking in this city full of colour. 

Mady by: Cellier Julie / Dangeul Mathis / Ginoyer Rémy / Jalliffier-Merlon Jules / Jouanneau Félix / Ritouni Théo / Streinger Hugo
